Description.Text: Albinas Hotel is located at the centre of the historical peninsula of Sultanahmet in Istanbul, which have had the honors of hosting the greatest civilizations in the history like the Roman, Byzantine and Ottoman Empires. It is only a walking distance away from historical places like, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Hippodrome, Sunken Cistern, Museum of Turkish Islamic Arts, Sultanahmet Square, Obelisk. Albinas Hotel is a new and rather secure building, which has been built with the earthquake resistant steel constructions. Albinas Hotel provides high level of comfort, special attention and first class service for its valued guests with its total of 28 rooms, where 25 of them are standard and 3 of them have Deluxe category that have been furnished with luxury furniture, with its terrace that has the view of the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Islands and the sea, with its lobby bar and breakfast lounge. Remark - from IST airport 25 euro one way transfer service and from SAW airport 60 euro one. Hotel also offers ballroom, dry cleaning, lobby and reception for hotel guests.

Albinas Hotel is the most correct selection in order to explore historical and cultural beauties of Istanbul since it is located just at the heart of the Sultanahmet, where it is in the historical peninsula of Istanbul. Access is rather easy from the Albinas Hotel to Ataturk Airport, Taksim, Besiktas, Sabiha Gokcen Airport by using the coastal road.

Standard Room - Standard Room with two twin or one double bed includes Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Internet access, Kettle, Laundry service, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Valet service. There are 25 standard rooms with twin or double bed alternatives and 3 deluxe rooms with double beds in classical/modern designed boutique hotel, which have 28 rooms in total with their unique architecture. 1 room in the deluxe category and 4 rooms in the standard category have balconies. Some of standard and deluxe rooms have the view of the Blue Mosque, the sea and the Hagia Sophia. All of rooms are non-smoking.
Deluxe Room - Deluxe Room with double bed includes Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Internet access, Kettle, Laundry service, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Room service, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Valet service. There are 25 standard rooms with twin or double bed alternatives and 3 deluxe rooms with double beds in classical/modern designed boutique hotel, which have 28 rooms in total with their unique architecture. 1 room in the deluxe category and 4 rooms in the standard category have balconies. Some of standard and deluxe rooms have the view of the Blue Mosque, the sea and the Hagia Sophia. All of rooms are non-smoking.
